channel.title: lately on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in lately on Barefoot Rob

item.title: lately
item.description: 14:01 Friday 26 April 2019 JST Lately I’ve been saying “see you next era” in Japanese just do draw attention to the fact that the era is going to change on May 1st. We’ve got a big pack of days off coming this Golden Week: 10! Most of my students are glad, but there are some people who are like wtf because schools and day care will be closed, but the parents (in service sector jobs) have to work.
